scripts.build: node generate_i18n.js && node generate_mp3_pages.js && node generate_story_pages.js
scripts.copy-libs: mkdir -p js/vendor && cp node_modules/i18next/dist/umd/i18next.min.js js/vendor/ && cp node_modules/i18next-http-backend/i18nextHttpBackend.min.js js/vendor/ && cp node_modules/i18next-browser-languagedetector/dist/umd/i18nextBrowserLanguageDetector.min.js js/vendor/
